description: The road leading to this crag is horrible and the bushwack is moderate to hard.  The usual satellite imagery in Google Earth doesn't show the potential but the orthoimages from the NS government shows a whopper of a wall with what even looks like a fissure running right in the middle of it. There are large cracks and my youtube video will show this better.  The bugs were defcon 5 level in May 2020.  BTW I am standing at the top of the wall in most picture for scale.
directions: Lays Lake Rd off highway 347 near Meaghers Grant.  At Lays Lake Y intersection, turn right.  follow this road for over 20 km or so to a y intersection where you park and start bushwacking; N44° 49' 59.5" W63° 02' 34.8". Crag is at; N44° 49' 39.1" W63° 02' 58.1".
title: Skull Lake Cliffs
